lauroth Mahulkyn was a cleric of Gond in the town of Kurth in the Vast in the midâ€“14 century DR.
As the nearest cleric capable of casting a detect lie spell in the late 1350s DR, the villagers of Maskyrs Eye would send to Kurth for Glauroth for help with questioning suspected miscreants..
